title: OCPC X3 RGB DDR4 3200MHz 8GB Desktop RAM

cat_seo_description: Buy OCPC RAM at the best price in Bangladesh. Latest OCPC RAM available at Star Tech Shop. Order online to get delivery anywhere in BD.
full_description:
OCPC X3 RGB DDR4 3200MHz 8GB Desktop RAM

The OCPC X3 RGB DDR4 3200MHz 8GB Desktop RAM is a high-performance memory module with stylish looks that can improve your gaming or computing experience. It has a sleek black design with RGB lights that can be modified and synced with other compatible devices using the OCPC app. The RGB lighting adds flair and personality to your PC setup, allowing it to stand out from the crowd. The capacity of the OCPC X3 RGB DDR4 3200MHz 8GB Desktop RAM is 8GB, and it operates on a single channel. The RAM's measured speed is an astounding 3200 MHz, ensuring quick data transfer and processing rates. This OCPC RAM has a latency of CL16-20-20-40, which indicates it responds swiftly and can retrieve stored data quickly. This RAM requires 1.35V to operate, making it energy-efficient and lowering total power usage in your system. This product is unbuffered and does not support ECC error checking, making it perfect for gamers and anyone wishing to boost PC performance without sacrificing stability.

Buy OCPC X3 RGB DDR4 3200MHz 8GB Desktop RAM From Star Tech

Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at lowest price. The OCPC X3 RGB DDR4 3200MHz 8GB Desktop RAM comes with lifetime warranty.

full_description:
OCPC PISTA DDR5 6200MHz 32GB (16GBx2) RGB RAM Kit

The OCPC PISTA DDR5 6200MHz 32GB (16GBx2) RGB memory kit provides outstanding performance and aesthetics for your gaming or high-end computing equipment. This dual-channel kit includes two 16GB DDR5 memory modules that run at a blistering 6200MHz with a low latency of CL32-38-38-76. Because the memory modules are unbuffered and non-ECC, they are compatible and stable with the majority of systems. In addition, the memory kit requires a low voltage of 1.35V, which decreases power consumption and heat generation. The OCPC PISTA DDR5 6200MHz 32GB (16GBx2) RGB RAM Kit is both powerful and beautiful. The memory modules are outfitted with a sleek black heatsink that provides excellent cooling and increases the memory's longevity. The heatsink also has RGB lighting that can be modified and coordinated with other compatible devices using the OCPC software. The RGB lighting adds flair and personality to your PC setup, making it stand out from the crowd.

full_description:
OCPC XT II DDR4 3200MHz 8GB Desktop RAM

The OCPC XT II DDR4 3200MHz 8GB Desktop RAM is designed for PC enthusiasts, overclockers, and extreme gamers. The XTREME II series DDR4 is constructed with specially screened ICs qualified by our professional Overclock team and is thoroughly tested for reliability, compatibility, and performance across a wide range of motherboards. This RAM has an 8GB capacity and runs on a single channel. This RAM's tested speed is 3200 MHz, with a tested latency of CL16-20-20-40, providing fast and dependable performance for your desktop PC. The OCPC XT II DDR4 3200MHz 8GB Desktop RAM is Intel XMP 2.0 (Extreme Memory Profile) compatible, allowing you to quickly overclock and enhance your memory's performance. The OCPC XT II DDR4 3200MHz 8GB RAM offers a low operating voltage of 1.35V, which decreases power consumption and heat generation, improving system performance and stability. Because the OCPC RAM is unbuffered and non-ECC, it is acceptable for most desktop PCs but lacks error correction features.
